name: Bio2RDF
body:
# Bio2RDF
Bio2RDF provides access to biological, chemical, and other scientific databases using semantic web technologies to provide common references for linked life science data.

## Authors and Contributors
Bio2RDF was created by Fran√ßois Belleau (@fbelleau) and Marc Alexandre Nolin. The scripts and databases are maintained by Michel Dumontier (@micheldumontier), Alison Callahan (@alisoncallahan), Jose Cruz-Toledo (@jctoledo) and Dana Klassen (@dklassen). Peter Ansell (@ansell) maintains the Web Application. 

### Support or Contact
The [Bio2RDF Mailing List](https://groups.google.com/group/bio2rdf) provides an easy way to discuss issues with the Bio2RDF community.
